prog.predictor.signature_instructions:
Basic Instruction: Carefully dissect the given context to identify and extract all entities that precisely match the specified entity_type. Beyond mere identification, ensure thorough verification by cross-checking each extracted entity against the provided relevant_entities_description and confirming it maintains a substantial contextual connection with similarly classified entities. Filter out entities that fall short of these definitive standards to uphold the accuracy and relevancy of the extraction.

Proposed Instruction: Analyze the given text to pinpoint all entities matching the specified entity_type. For each identified entity, cross-check it with the relevant_entities_description to ensure strong contextual alignment with other entities of the same type. Eliminate any entities that do not meet these criteria to maintain high extraction accuracy and relevance.
